metatags.parsely-metadata: {"description":"Tom Hanks. He has a reputation for being one of the nicest guys in Hollywood. If you've ever caught him on a talk show (especially when he's on Conan O'Brien, their chemistry is not to be missed--take a peek here) then you know he's funny, laid back, in on the joke and doesn't take himself--or the crazy world of being a \"public figure\" too seriously. He has fun, you can tell he knows that life is too short and he's just enjoying the ride.","image-16-9":"https://media.glamour.com/photos/56957bf9085ae0a85036cc06/16:9/w_1000,c_limit/entertainment-blogs-obsessed-0828_tom-hanks_sm-tl.jpg","image-1-1":"https://media.glamour.com/photos/56957bf9085ae0a85036cc06/1:1/w_1000,c_limit/entertainment-blogs-obsessed-0828_tom-hanks_sm-tl.jpg"}
metatags.og:description: Tom Hanks. He has a reputation for being one of the nicest guys in Hollywood. If you've ever caught him on a talk show (especially when he's on Conan O'Brien, their chemistry is not to be missed--take a peek here) then you know he's funny, laid back, in on the joke and doesn't take himself--or the crazy world of being a "public figure" too seriously. He has fun, you can tell he knows that life is too short and he's just enjoying the ride.
metatags.twitter:creator: @glamourmag
metatags.twitter:title: Tom Hanks Just Set the Bar Way High For Most Awesome Picture a Celeb Has EVER Taken With A Fan!
metatags.author: Condé Nast
metatags.og:title: Tom Hanks Just Set the Bar Way High For Most Awesome Picture a Celeb Has EVER Taken With A Fan!
metatags.article:author: Lauren Brown
metatags.twitter:description: Tom Hanks. He has a reputation for being one of the nicest guys in Hollywood. If you've ever caught him on a talk show (especially when he's on Conan O'Brien, their chemistry is not to be missed--take a peek here) then you know he's funny, laid back, in on the joke and doesn't take himself--or the crazy world of being a "public figure" too seriously. He has fun, you can tell he knows that life is too short and he's just enjoying the ride.

newsarticle.articlebody: Tom Hanks turns the tables on a prankster – to become an internet hit. The Forrest Gump star kept his cool and played along as a fan slumped next to him in a restaurant – after nicking...

title: Mystery Diners - Wikipedia
snippet: Mystery Diners was an American reality television series on the Food Network. The series, hosted by Charles Stiles, debuted on May 25, 2012.

metatags.og:description: The Ladykillers: Directed by Ethan Coen, Joel Coen. With Tom Hanks, Irma P. Hall, Marlon Wayans, J.K. Simmons. An eccentric, if not charming Southern professor and his crew pose as a classical ensemble in order to rob a casino, all under the nose of his unsuspecting but sharp old landlady.
